projects.title: L-ink
projects.desc: As a result of a UI/UX project, L-ink is a fictional platform aimed at connecting tattoo artists and clients. From financial management to appointment scheduling, and highlighting the tattoo artists' projects, L-ink positions itself as a comprehensive tool for tattoo artists and a practical and stylish discovery space for clients.

projects.title: Neurosciences Part I / CAUSES
projects.desc: Posters serie inspired by a mind map from the Integrated Mental Health Science course (NURS603) at Auckland University of Technology, explaining the various causes of depression. Project's DNA : illustrate science.

projects.title: Neurosciences Part II / TREATMENTS
projects.desc: Posters serie inspired by a mind map from Auckland University of Technology's Integrated Mental Health Science (NURS603) course, explaining the different treatments for depression. DNA of the project: illustrating science.

projects.title: Serge Lutens
projects.desc: Creation of a new visual identity for the Serge Lutens brand, as well as an anniversary campaign based on the new identity concept, on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of the « Féminité du Bois » perfume.

about.desc:
Student at E-artsup Lyon, Grand École program.#nI’m driven by the sense of satisfaction that comes from successfully communicating visually the ideas or concepts that I feel internally.#nHere you will find some of my creative works, made on various mediums, both digital and manual, through which I hope to best reflect my ideas and vision of art and communication.#n(Although the number of small dots on my drawings might suggest otherwise, I’m of sound mind)#gCurrently looking for a work-study program !
En recherche d’alternance !
